items.content_html: Modelita is a domain-specific language (DSL) for creating 3D shapes through code. It provides a flexible approach to describing geometry, enabling users to generate 3D data with ease while keeping the system lightweight and simple.
items.title: DanyMotilla/MODELITA: Modelita is a domain-specific language (DSL) for creating 3D shapes through code. It provides a flexible approach to describing geometry, enabling users to generate 3D data with ease while keeping the system lightweight and simple.

items.content_html: A lightweight, modular game engine built for modern browsers using WebGPU. Designed to be small enough for js13k game jam projects, with a focus on simplicity, performance, and flexibility.
items.title: snowfrogdev/nanojet: A lightweight, modular game engine built for modern browsers using WebGPU. Designed to be small enough for js13k game jam projects, with a focus on simplicity, performance, and flexibility.

items.content_html: A lightweight Typescript library that interacts with Gotenberg's different modules to convert a variety of document formats to PDF files.

items.content_html: Insomnie is a lightweight CLI and TUI HTTP client for developers. Inspired by Postman, Insomnia, Bruno and Cartero, but with a minimalist text-based interface. Test and debug APIs quickly with an intuitive and customizable tool.
items.title: marco-gallegos/insomnie: Insomnie is a lightweight CLI and TUI HTTP client for developers. Inspired by Postman, Insomnia, Bruno and Cartero, but with a minimalist text-based interface. Test and debug APIs quickly with an intuitive and customizable tool.

items.content_html: Noads is a lightweight Chrome extension that removes specific DOM elements using CSS selectors, effectively blocking ads on web pages.
items.title: Jamison-Chen/Noads: Noads is a lightweight Chrome extension that removes specific DOM elements using CSS selectors, effectively blocking ads on web pages.

items.content_html: an ecosystem of lightweight TypeScript packages for AT Protocol, the protocol powering Bluesky.

items.content_html: A lightweight Node.js library for AES and DES encryption, offering flexible encoding options, support for various cipher modes, and seamless integration with streams.
items.title: kiki-kanri/node-ciphers: A lightweight Node.js library for AES and DES encryption, offering flexible encoding options, support for various cipher modes, and seamless integration with streams.
